thread.title: Notre Dame’s Alex Bars out for season with ankle break
thread.title_full: Notre Dame’s Alex Bars out for season with ankle break

author: wtopstaff
title: Notre Dame’s Alex Bars out for season with ankle break
text:
By The Associated Press October 18, 2015 2:47 pm 
SOUTH BEND, Ind. (AP) — Notre Dame guard Alex Bars is out for the season after fracturing his left ankle against Southern California. 
Coach Brian Kelly said during a conference call Sunday the 6-foot-6, 320-pound sophomore will have surgery. Bars was hurt midway through the second quarter. USC defensive tackle Delvon Simmons was blocked into Bars’ leg during a 26-yard run by Josh Adams. 
Bars, a left guard, was making his second start because Quenton Nelson sprained his ankle during a loss at No. 6 Clemson on Oct. 3. Nelson replaced Bars on Saturday. 
The No. 11 Irish (6-1) are off this week and play at No. 22 Temple (6-0) on Oct. 31. Topics:
